ams":[],"resourceList":[]},"timeout":{"enable":false,"strategy":""},"maxRetryTimes":"0","taskInstancePriority":"MEDIUM","name":"STOCK_CONCENTRATION_RATIO","dependence":{},"retryInterval":"1","preTasks":[],"id":"tasks-65606","workerGroup":"default"},{"conditionResult":{"successNode":[""],"failedNode":[""]},"description":"实时股票发行制度分布","runFlag":"NORMAL","type":"PYTHON","params":{"rawScript":"com.kingdomai.creditrisk.jobs.StockIpoTypeJob","localParams":[],"resourceList":[]},"timeout":{"enable":false,"strategy":""},"maxRetryTimes":"0","taskInstancePriority":"MEDIUM","name":"STOCK_IPO_TYPE","dependence":{},"retryInterval":"1","preTasks":[],"id":"tasks-80794","workerGroup":"default"}],"tenantId":2,"timeout":0}

)


with stk_pledge_tmp as ( -- a股票质押比例
    select
    stk_code,
    wind_code,
    ddln_date,
    pledge_ratio,-- 质押比例
    ashare_gl_cptl,-- a股总股本
    unrestrict_share_pledge_qty+restrict_share_pledge_qty as ful_mkt_pledge_tot -- 全市场质押股数
    -- coalesce(unrestrict_share_pledge_qty,0)+coalesce(restrict_share_pledge_qty,0) as ful_mkt_pledge_tot-- 全市场质押股数
    from (
        select
        left(S_INFO_WINDCODE, 6) as stk_code,
        S_INFO_WINDCODE AS wind_code,
        S_ENDDATE as ddln_date,
        S_PLEDGE_NUM as pledge_plot,
        S_SHARE_UNRESTRICTED_NUM as unrestrict_share_pledge_qty,
        S_SHARE_RESTRICTED_NUM as restrict_share_pledge_qty,
        S_TOT_SHR as ashare_gl_cptl,
        S_PLEDGE_RATIO/100 as pledge_ratio,
        row_number() over(partition by S_INFO_WINDCODE order by S_ENDDATE desc) rn
        from wind.ASHAREPLEDGEPROPORTION 
    )t1
    where  rn = 1
),

pledge_tmp_1 as
(-- a股股权质押信息
select
left(t1.S_INFO_WINDCODE, 6) as stk_code,
-- t1.trd_mkt_code, -- todo
t1.S_INFO_WINDCODE as wind_code,
t1.ANN_DT as notice_date,
t1.S_HOLDER_ID as stkhld_id,
t1.S_PLEDGE_BGDATE AS pledge_start_date,
-- t1.S_HOLDER_ID, -- todo:控股股东id
t1.S_HOLDER_NAME AS stkhld_name,
t1.S_PLEDGOR as pledge_name,
t1.S_PLEDGOR_ID as pledgor_id,
t1.S_TOTAL_HOLDING_SHR_RATIO as share_hld_ratio,
t1.S_PLEDGE_SHARES as  aggr_pledge_stk_num,-- 质押数
t1.S_TOTAL_HOLDING_SHR as share_hld_totl_num ,-- 持股数
COALESCE(t1.S_PLEDGE_SHARES/t1.S_TOTAL_HOLDING_SHR, 0) as aggr_pledge_stk_hld_ratio,-- 质押/持股  -- 
COALESCE(t1.S_PLEDGE_SHR_RATIO,t1.S_PLEDGE_SHARES/t1.gl_cptl) as aggr_pledge_gl_cptl_ratio,-- 质押/总股本
first_value(gl_cptl) over(partition by S_INFO_WINDCODE order by ANN_DT desc) qrt_gl_cptl
from
(
  select  *,S_TOTAL_HOLDING_SHR/S_TOTAL_HOLDING_SHR_RATIO as gl_cptl,
    row_number() over(partition by S_INFO_WINDCODE,S_HOLDER_ID order by ANN_DT desc) rev_seq
  from wind.ASHAREEQUITYPLEDGEINFO WHERE  ANN_DT <=  ${biz_date}
)t1 where rev_seq = 1
),

pledge_tmp as ( -- a股股权质押信息
select 
pledge_tmp_1.*, 
b.stkhld_id as domi_stkholde_id
from pledge_tmp_1
left join(
	select * from (
		select 
		wind_code,
		stkhld_id,
		row_number() over (partition by wind_code order by share_hld_totl_num desc) as rn
		from pledge_tmp_1
		 )a
	where a.rn = 1
)b
on pledge_tmp_1.wind_code = b.wind_code
),



ashare_main_holder_tmp as -- 中国a股前十大股东
(
select *
from (select
    S_INFO_WINDCODE as wind_code,
    S_HOLDER_ANAME as stkhld_name,
    S_HOLDER_QUANTITY/10000 as share_hld_qty,-- 持股数
    S_HOLDER_PCT as share_hld_ratio,-- 持股比例
    S_HOLDER_QUANTITY/S_HOLDER_PCT/10000 as total_shares,-- 总股本
    S_HOLDER_ENDDATE as ddln_date,
    S_INFO_COMPCODE as co_id,
    S_HOLDER_SEQUENCE as rpt_quar_release_seq,-- 序号
    row_number() over(partition by REPORT_PERIOD order by S_HOLDER_QUANTITY desc) share_hld_rank,
    dense_rank() over(partition by S_INFO_WINDCODE order by REPORT_PERIOD desc) rk
from wind.ASHAREINSIDEHOLDER where S_HOLDER_SEQUENCE=1)t1 where rk =1
),

main_hold_inf_tmp as (

 select
 wind_code,
 sum(fst_hold_pledge_tot) as fst_hold_pledge_tot,
 sum(hold_pledge_tot) as hold_pledge_tot,
 sum(fhpt_hpt_prop) as fhpt_hpt_prop,
 sum(fhpt_agc_prop) as fhpt_agc_prop,
 sum(fhpt_sum_hpt_prop) as fhpt_sum_hpt_prop,
 sum(fhpt_sum_agc_prop) as fhpt_sum_agc_prop,
 sum(trust_ast_mang_hold_artio) as trust_ast_mang_hold_artio,
 max(pledge_start_date) as pledge_start_date
 from (select
    wind_code,
    aggr_pledge_stk_num as fst_hold_pledge_tot,-- 质押
    share_hld_totl_num as hold_pledge_tot,-- 持股
    aggr_pledge_stk_hld_ratio as fhpt_hpt_prop,
    aggr_pledge_gl_cptl_ratio as fhpt_agc_prop,
    NULL AS  fhpt_sum_hpt_prop,
    NULL AS  fhpt_sum_agc_prop,
    NULL AS  trust_ast_mang_hold_artio,
    NULL AS  pledge_start_date
    from pledge_tmp where stkhld_id=domi_stkholde_id
union all
    select
        wind_code,
        0 as fst_hold_pledge_tot,
        0 as hold_pledge_tot,
        NULL AS  fhpt_hpt_prop,
        NULL AS  fhpt_agc_prop,
        sum(aggr_pledge_stk_num)/sum(share_hld_totl_num) as fhpt_sum_hpt_prop,-- >百分之5质押总数 持股百分之5以上控股质押总数/持股总数
        sum(aggr_pledge_stk_num)/max(qrt_gl_cptl) as fhpt_sum_agc_prop,-- >百分之5持股总数 持股百分之5以上控股质押总数/总股本
        NULL AS  trust_ast_mang_hold_artio,
        NULL AS  pledge_start_date
    from pledge_tmp where share_hld_ratio > 0.05 group by wind_code
union ALL
select
  wind_code,
  NULL AS  fst_hold_pledge_tot,
  NULL AS  hold_pledge_tot,
  NULL AS  fhpt_hpt_prop,
  NULL AS  fhpt_agc_prop,
  NULL AS  fhpt_sum_hpt_prop,
  NULL AS  fhpt_sum_agc_prop,
  sum(share_hld_ratio) as trust_ast_mang_hold_artio,
  NULL AS  pledge_start_date
from ashare_main_holder_tmp
where stkhld_name not regexp '.+中央汇金.+'
and (stkhld_name regexp '.+资金管理.+' or stkhld_name regexp '.+信托.+')
group by wind_code
union all
select wind_code,
  NULL AS  fst_hold_pledge_tot,
  NULL AS  hold_pledge_tot,
  NULL AS  fhpt_hpt_prop,
  NULL AS  fhpt_agc_prop,
  NULL AS  fhpt_sum_hpt_prop,
  NULL AS  fhpt_sum_agc_prop,
  NULL AS  trust_ast_mang_hold_artio,
  max(pledge_start_date) as pledge_start_date
from pledge_tmp group by wind_code
    )t1 group by wind_code
),
-- 我是华丽的分割线
div_fin_tmp as
(-- 分红融资信息
select
	t.wind_code,
	cast(t.tot_raise_cptl as decimal(38,8)) as tot_raise_amt,
	cast(t.tot_dividend_amt as decimal(38,8)) as tot_coupon_amt,
	cast(t.dividend_amt_3y as decimal(38,8)) as dividend_amt_3y,
	cast(t.tot_dividend_amt/t.tot_raise_cptl as decimal(38,8)) as tot_coupon_raise_ratio
from
	(
	select
		t1.wind_code as wind_code,
		COALESCE(t4.tot_dividend_amt,0)	as tot_dividend_amt,
		COALESCE(t4.dividend_amt_3y,0)	as dividend_amt_3y,
		COALESCE(t1.raise_cptl,0)+COALESCE(t2.raise_cptl,0)+COALESCE(t3.raise_cptl,0) as tot_raise_cptl
	from
		(select S_INFO_WINDCODE as wind_code, S_IPO_COLLECTION/10000 as raise_cptl  
		from wind.ASHAREIPO ) t1 -- 中国A股ipo
	left outer join
		(
		select
			S_INFO_WINDCODE as wind_code,
			sum(S_FELLOW_COLLECTION) as raise_cptl
		from
			wind.ASHARESEO   -- A股增发
		where
			ANN_DT = ${biz_date}
		and
			S_FELLOW_PROGRESS = '3'
		group by 1
		) t2
	on
		t1.wind_code = t2.wind_code
	left outer join
		(
		select
			S_INFO_WINDCODE as wind_code,
			sum(S_RIGHTSISSUE_NETCOLLECTION) as raise_cptl
		from
			wind.ASHARERIGHTISSUE  -- 中国A股配股
		where
   		 ANN_DT = ${biz_date}
		and
			S_RIGHTSISSUE_PROGRESS = '3'
		group by 1
		)t3
	on
		t1.wind_code = t3.wind_code
	left outer join
		(
		select
			t1.wind_code,
			sum(t1.basis_share_cptl*t1.per_share_dividend_tax_before*10000) as tot_dividend_amt,
			sum(if(t1.coupon_year>'%(v_before3yrfttrddate)s',t1.basis_share_cptl*t1.per_share_dividend_tax_before*10000,0)) as dividend_amt_3y
		from
			(select S_INFO_WINDCODE as wind_code,
					REPORT_PERIOD as coupon_year, -- 分红年度
					S_DIV_BASESHARE/10000 as  basis_share_cptl,
					CASH_DVD_PER_SH_PRE_TAX as per_share_dividend_tax_before
					from wind.ASHAREDIVIDEND where S_DIV_PROGRESS = '3') t1  -- A股分红
		inner join
			(select S_INFO_WINDCODE as wind_code,
					S_IPO_LISTDATE as list_date from wind.ASHAREIPO ) t2 -- A股ipo
		on
			t1.wind_code = t2.wind_code
		where
			cast(t1.coupon_year as decimal(8,0))>t2.list_date
		group by t1.wind_code
		)t4 
	on
		t1.wind_code = t4.wind_code
	)t
)

cast(rank() over(partition by t3.sw_sec_code order by t2.TDY_TOTL_MKT_VAL desc)  as decimal(8) ) as mkt_val_industry_rank,
cast(count(1) over(partition by t3.sw_sec_code) as decimal(8) ) as comp_cnt,

t2.turnover_last3m_avg,
t2.turnover_last6m_avg,

t2.yest_close_price,
t2.sec_abbr,-- 这个建表有问题，需要重新建表,这个用来判断是否ST
t2.susp_date,
t2.continus_susp_date,
t2.continus_days,
if(t2.continus_days>4,1,0) as is_continus5dsusp,
t2.resume_trading_date,
-- t5.ashare_gl_cptl,
t6.gl_cptl,
t5.pledge_ratio,
t5.ful_mkt_pledge_tot,
-- t11.pledge_glaxy_tot/10000 as pledge_glaxy_tot,-- 质押银河股数, 不计算
-- t11.pledge_glaxy_tot/t5.ashare_gl_cptl/10000 as pledge_glaxy_prop,-- 质押银河比例,不计算

t8.hold_pledge_tot,
t8.fhpt_hpt_prop,
t8.fhpt_agc_prop,
t8.fhpt_sum_hpt_prop,
t8.fhpt_sum_agc_prop,
(t2.TDY_TOTL_MKT_VAL+t1.have_intr_debt-t1.monetary_cap)/t1.intr_tax_depr_amor_bef_profit as com_value_mul,
-- (t2.TDY_TOTL_MKT_VAL+t1.tot_liab-t1.cash_cash_equ_end_period)/t1.intr_tax_depr_amor_bef_profit as com_value_mul,
t2.ann_volatility,
now() as data_time,
if(t12.wind_code is null,'0','1') as is_st,-- 当前处于ST IS_ST
cast(t5.pledge_ratio*t2.TDY_TOTL_MKT_VAL as DECIMAL(38,8)) as PLEDGE_MKT_VALUE,-- 质押股份市值
t8.trust_ast_mang_hold_artio,-- 十大流通股东含信托资管持股 TRUST_AST_MANG_HOLD_ARTIO
t13.tot_coupon_raise_ratio,-- DIV_FIN_RATIO 分红融资比
t13.dividend_amt_3y,-- CUMU_CASH_DIV_TOT 累计现金分红总额
cast(rank() over(order by t13.dividend_amt_3y desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as cumu_cash_div_tot_qunt,
cast(rank() over(order by t13.tot_coupon_raise_ratio desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as div_fin_ratio_qunt,
cast(rank() over(order by t2.turnover_last6m_avg desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as turnover_last6m_avg_qunt,
cast(rank() over(order by t2.tdy_totl_mkt_val_last6m_avg desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as totl_mkt_val_last6m_avg_qunt,
cast(rank() over(order by t1.dednlos_netpft desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as dednlos_netpft_qunt,
cast(rank() over(order by t1.biz_income_3inc desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as biz_income_3inc_qunt,
cast(rank() over(order by t1.sync_pof_gros_prt_3yinc desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as sync_pof_gros_prt_3yinc_qunt,
cast(rank() over(order by t1.tot_assets_3yinc desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as tot_assets_3yinc_qunt,
cast(rank() over(order by t1.net_cash_flows_oper_act desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as net_cash_flows_oper_act_qunt,
cast(rank() over(order by t2.ann_volatility desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as ann_volatility_qunt,
cast(rank() over(order by t2.MATCH_AMT_LAST6M_AVG desc)/COUNT(1) over() as decimal(38,8)) as match_amt_last6m_avg_qunt,
t1.ntcs_flows_opat_last_y1 as ntcs_flows_opat_last_y1 ,
t1.ntcs_flows_opat_last_y2 as ntcs_flows_opat_last_y2 ,
-- t1.ntcs_flows_opat_last_y1+t1.ntcs_flows_opat_last_y2+if(mod(t1.latest_period_fin_dt,10000)=1231,t1.ntcs_flows_opat_last_y3,t1.net_cash_flows_oper_act) as ntcs_flows_opat_last_y3,
t1.ntcs_flows_opat_last_y3 as ntcs_flows_opat_last_y3 ,
t1.cash_recp_sg_and_rs_last_y1 as cash_recp_sg_and_rs_last_y1 ,
t1.cash_recp_sg_and_rs_last_y2 as cash_recp_sg_and_rs_last_y2 ,
t1.cash_recp_sg_and_rs_last_y3 as cash_recp_sg_and_rs_last_y3 ,
t1.sync_pof_gros_prt_last_y2 as sync_pof_gros_prt_last_y2 ,
t1.sync_pof_gros_prt_last_y3 as sync_pof_gros_prt_last_y3 ,
t5.ddln_date as pledge_date,
t2.match_qty_tot_90d as match_qty_tot_90d,
t14.par_val as par_val,
t15.ashare_stkhld_hz_hold as ashare_stkhld_hz_hold,
t2.pe_ratio as pe_ratio,
-- t16.tdy_guar_sec_mkt_val as curd_guar_securities_mkt,
-- t16.tdy_sec_totl_mkt_val as curd_securities_mkt,
-- t16.tdy_guar_sec_mkt_val/t16.tdy_sec_totl_mkt_val as guar_sec_prop,
t16.fin_value as curd_guar_securities_mkt,
t16.fin_total_value as curd_securities_mkt,
t16.accounted as guar_sec_prop,
(SELECT MAX(date_code)
FROM pledge_risk_01.pub_date
WHERE trd_daily_flag = '1' AND date_code <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')
) as biz_date,
t2.tdy_outstand_mkt_val
from
(
select * from (select *,row_number() over(partition by wind_code order by biz_date desc) rn
	from wind.mid_corp_fin_d where biz_date <= ${biz_date})t where rn =1
)t1
left join (select * from wind.mid_ashare_mkt_der_idx_d where biz_date = ${biz_date}) t2
on t1.wind_code=t2.wind_code
left join (
    select 
		left(S_INFO_WINDCODE, 6) as stk_code,
		left(S_INFO_WINDCODE, 6) as sec_unique_code, -- stk_code和sec_unique_code区别？
		S_INFO_WINDCODE as wind_code,SW_IND_CODE as industry_code,
        substring(SW_IND_CODE,1,6) as sw_sec_code
    from wind.ASHARESWINDUSTRIESCLASS 
    where CUR_SIGN='1'
 )t3 on t1.wind_code=t3.wind_code
 left join (
    select * from wind.mid_industry_sw_inf_d where biz_date=${biz_date})t4
on concat(t3.sw_sec_code, '0000')=t4.sw_sec_code
left join stk_pledge_tmp t5 on t1.wind_code=t5.wind_code
left join main_hold_inf_tmp t8 on t1.wind_code=t8.wind_code
-- left join (select 
-- 	trd_mkt_code,stk_code,
-- 	sum(endg_underlying_qty) as pledge_glaxy_tot
-- 	from fdm.ast_cust_inbu_cont_ha  -- 表没找到,质押于银河。
-- 	where biz_date = {biz_date} and inbu_type_code = '02' and cont_sts_code in ('0','1','2')
-- 	group by trd_mkt_code,stk_code
-- )t11 on t1.stk_code=t11.stk_code and t1.trd_mkt_code=t11.trd_mkt_code
left join (select S_INFO_WINDCODE AS wind_code, left(S_INFO_WINDCODE,6) as stk_code
			from wind.ASHAREST  -- 中国A股特别处理表
			WHERE  ANN_DT<= ${biz_date}  and S_TYPE_ST='S' and REMOVE_DT is NULL
	)t12 on t1.wind_code=t12.wind_code
left join div_fin_tmp t13 on t1.wind_code=t13.wind_code
left join (
select S_INFO_WINDCODE as wind_code,S_IPO_PAR as par_val
from wind.ASHAREIPO  -- todo:跟ashareipo 的区别？
)t14
on t1.wind_code=t14.wind_code
left join (
select
wind_code,ashare_stkhld_hz_hold
from (select
	S_INFO_WINDCODE AS wind_code,
	S_HOLDER_NUM AS ashare_stkhld_hz_hold,
	S_HOLDER_TOTAL_NUM AS stkhld_all_hz_hold,
	row_number() over(partition by S_INFO_WINDCODE order by S_HOLDER_ENDDATE desc)rn
	from  wind.ASHAREHOLDERNUMBER )t1 where rn =1  -- 中国A股股东户数
)t15 on t1.wind_code=t15.wind_code
left join (
-- 	select stk_code,tdy_guar_sec_mkt_val,tdy_sec_totl_mkt_val
-- 	from FDM.INF_ASHARE_MARGIN_GUAR_STA_HA where biz_date = {biz_date}  -- 表未找到
	SELECT created_at, code as stk_code, fin_value, fin_total_value, accounted 
	FROM pledge_risk_01.lr_guar_daily_sta
  	where  created_at = ${biz_date}
)t16 on t1.stk_code=t16.stk_code
left join (
select wind_code, gl_cptl
 from (select 
 	S_INFO_WINDCODE AS wind_code,
 	TOT_SHR AS gl_cptl,
 	FLOAT_SHR/10000 AS out_stk,
 	CHANGE_DT as fluc_date,
 row_number() over(partition by S_INFO_WINDCODE order by CHANGE_DT desc)rn
from wind.ASHARECAPITALIZATION   -- 中国A股股本
)t where rn =1
)t6 on t1.wind_code=t6.wind_code
